titleStmt.title: The gayne of losse or temporall losses spiritually improved in a centurye & one decad of meditations & resolves. By John Warner M.A. sometimes of Magd: Hall in Oxo: & one of the ministers of the London Brigade in the late western expedition 1644.
titleStmt.author: Warner, John, b. 1612 or 13.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for H. Blunden at the Castle in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
